hopobject.name: 3dhubsbeagleboard
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_10_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/46.0.2490.71 Safari/537.36
hopobject.body:
3D Hubs creates Portable Lab for Beaglebone Black. 

The portable lab contains space for a half size breadboard, your beaglebone black and a compartment for small items such as resistors. We wanted to create something that is a product in its own right and 3D Printable! Functional 3D printing is at the core of the technology so with this in mind we created the Beaglebone Black portable lab. 

3D Hubs offers localised 3D printing services. To make 3D printing as accessible possible we have opened up our network to the Beagleboard community by creating a case which makes it easy to take your projects on the go! 

Our Instructables post, which explains printing settings and how to assemble the case is available here.

The files for the case are available at Youmagine on this link where you can also get it printed directly through 3D Hubs.
hopobject.shortdesc: A portable project case that you can put in your bag and take with you.
